[Y]Scene Etiquette
[W]Compete hard, credit harder.
[c][m.]
[W]Always credit coders, artists and
[W]musicians clearly in releases and
[W]docs.
[W]Constructive critique helps everyone
[W]improve without killing morale.
[c][m.]
[G]- Credit creators.
[G]- Share sources when possible.
[G]- Respect collaboration.
[m][m-]
[Y]CODE OF SCENE
[C]Skill and respect can coexist.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
